Package Controller

Class ModifyPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ModifyPart
  • public class ModifyPart
extends java.lang.Object
    Modify Part Controller Class This controller handles the processing and functionality of the "Modify Part" stage.

    • Method Detail

      • buttonClickCancel

        public void buttonClickCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This function is called when the user clicks the "Cancel" button. This will close the "Modify Part" stage and reopen the "Main Screen" stage.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event object passed by JavaFX

      • buttonClickSave

        public void buttonClickSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This function is called when the user clicks the "Save" button. This will check the text boxes for valid input from user and alert user if any errors are found. This will then save the part to the Inventory Object. This will close the "Add Part" stage and reopen the "Main Screen" stage.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event object passed by JavaFX

      • openMainScreen

        public void openMainScreen​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This will close the "Modift Part" stage and reopen the "Main Screen" stage. This will also pass the Inventory inv object back to Main Controller.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event object passed by JavaFX

      • passInInventory

        public void passInInventory​(Inventory inventoryObject,
                            Part selectedPart)
        This handles the passing in the Inventory inv object from the Main Controller. This also, passes in the selected part object used to modify.
        Parameters:
        inventoryObject - Main Inventory Object
        selectedPart - Part Object that is being manipulated and updated.

      • userCheckedInHouse

        public void userCheckedInHouse​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        User Clicks the radio button, "InHouse." Updates identifier label From Company Name to Machine Id.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event object passed by JavaFX

      • userCheckedOutsourced

        public void userCheckedOutsourced​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        User Clicks the radio button, "Outsourced." Updates identifier label From Machine Id to Company Name.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event object passed by JavaFX
